Football Analytics: Market Value & Transfers

Apr 19, 2025
Emir Dogan

Football Analytics Dashboard Player Values, Position Distributions & League Stats This project provides visual insights into European football playersâ€™ market values, transfer records, and position-based statistics. Using Python and EDA techniques, meaningful patterns are presented through interactive charts and heatmaps.

Datasets Used: Player profiles (players.csv)

Transfer history (transfers.csv)

Match & competition data (games.csv, competitions.csv)

Player valuations over time (player_valuations.csv)

Key Features: Distribution of top 1000 players by country and position

Transfer flows across leagues

Average market value by position

Heatmaps and interactive visualizations
